full_output.summary: A dynamic and driven third-year BTech student majoring in Information Technology.Proficient in C, Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP, I also have skills in video editing and basic graphic design. Eager to apply my technical expertise and creativity to real-world projects, Im seeking opportunities to contribute and grow in the field of IT.

certifications.title: AWS Academy Graduate - AWS Academy Cloud Foundations

projects.name: Inventory Management System
projects.description: Utilized Java for back-end functionality. HTML, CSS and JavaScript for front-end development. The system incorporated features such as real-time inventory tracking, order management, and user authentication. Implemented database integration to store and retrieve product information efficiently.

projects.name: Hospital Management System
projects.description: Utilized Java for back-end functionality. HTML, CSS and JavaScript for front-end development. Implemented features such as patient registration, appointment scheduling, and medical record management. Integrated database functionality for efficient data storage and retrieval.

projects.name: Intrusion Detection System (IDS) using LEACH
projects.description: Developed an Intrusion Detection System (IDS) utilizing the LEACH protocol in NetSim. Integrated Python scripting and machine learning algorithms for efficient anomaly detection. This system effectively monitors network traffic, identifying and mitigating potential security breaches in real-time.

projects.name: Website for an NGO
projects.description: Utilized Node.js, Express.js and PostgreSQL for back-end functionality. HTML, CSS and JavaScript for front-end development. Implemented features such as user registration, user login, user logout and their record management. Functionality to donate has also been provided.
